story_27_56000/2401_1001_0200_10: Why would Hoopa do that...for me?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_0400_10: Young master! I’m so glad you’re all right!
story_27_56000/2401_1001_0500_10: Master Leeear! Is it really you?!
story_27_56000/2401_1001_0700_10: I thought you’d gone back to the kingdom.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_0800_10: Oh... That was totally just a ruse.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_0900_10:
What we were doing obviously wasn’t working,
so we had Cheren try to be a guiding voice for
you instead.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_1000_10: We wanted to help you change.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I can’t believe you’d walk into a trap like that all
by yourself! What were you thinking?!
story_27_56000/2401_1001_1500_10: If anything ever happened to you, I’d...I’d...
story_27_56000/2401_1001_2000_10: We’re just suuuper glad you’re OK, OK?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_2300_10: You guys...you did all of that for me?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_2400_10: I’m glad you’re safe, at any rate.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_2500_10:
They captured you, didn’t they? How did you
manage to escape?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_2700_10: I see. So it was Hoopa that saved you.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_2900_10: Why would Hoopa help me escape?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_3000_10: Why save me when it could have saved itself?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Maybe it was trying to help you protect the things
you care about.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_3300_10: Hoopa’s been right by your side, hasn’t it?
story_27_56000/2401_1001_3400_10:
I’m sure it knows how important the PML and
becoming king are to you.
story_27_56000/2401_1001_3500_10:
So it did whatever it could to keep your dream
alive. I’m sure that in Hoopa’s mind...
